notes: Two multi-sets are equal if every element occurs the same number of times in both sets.
legend:
Given a number $n.$ A factorisation of $n$ is a multi-set of integers $\{ d_1 \dots  d_r \}$ whose elements multiplies to $n:$
$$
n=\prod_{i=1}^r d_i
$$

Given $n,$ Find the number of its possible factorisations.
output: An integer representing the number of possible factorisations.
input: A line containing one integer $1 \le n \le 10^9$
name: Count Factorisations
